metas.name: Moana
metas.description: A brave and adventurous princess story with great music and visuals.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon
metas.description: A heartwarming story about friendship between a boy and a dragon.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
metas.description: Continues the adventures of Hiccup and Toothless with more action and emotional depth.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
metas.description: The epic conclusion to the trilogy, with stunning animation and a powerful message.

metas.name: Toy Story
metas.description: A classic about the secret life of toys and the importance of friendship.

metas.name: Toy Story 2
metas.description: Woody and Buzz Lightyear embark on a new adventure to rescue Woody from a toy collector.

metas.name: Toy Story 3
metas.description: The toys face their biggest challenge yet as Andy prepares to go to college.

metas.name: Toy Story 4
metas.description: A new adventure for Woody and Buzz as they meet new friends and face new challenges.

metas.name: Finding Nemo
metas.description: A heartwarming story about a father's love for his son and overcoming fears.

metas.name: Finding Dory
metas.description: Dory embarks on a journey to find her family, with plenty of laughs and heartfelt moments.

metas.name: Monsters, Inc.
metas.description: A hilarious and heartwarming story about monsters who discover that laughter is more powerful than screams.

metas.name: Monsters University
metas.description: A prequel to Monsters, Inc., showing how Mike and Sulley became friends in college.

metas.name: The Incredibles
metas.description: A superhero family tries to live a normal life, but they are called back into action to save the world.

metas.name: Incredibles 2
metas.description: The Incredibles face new challenges as Elastigirl takes the spotlight and Mr. Incredible stays at home with the kids.

metas.name: Ratatouille
metas.description: A rat with a passion for cooking teams up with a garbage boy to become a chef in Paris.

metas.name: Up
metas.description: A heartwarming and adventurous story about an old man who ties balloons to his house and flies to South America.

metas.name: A Bug's Life
metas.description: An inventive ant teams up with misfit circus bugs to save his colony from grasshoppers.

metas.name: Cars
metas.description: A fast-paced and heartwarming story about a race car who learns the importance of friendship and slowing down.

metas.name: Cars 2
metas.description: Lightning McQueen and Mater travel the world for a racing competition, but they get caught up in a spy adventure.

metas.name: Cars 3
metas.description: Lightning McQueen faces a new generation of racers and must find a way to stay competitive.

metas.name: Paddington
metas.description: A charming and heartwarming story about a bear who finds a home in London.

metas.name: Paddington 2
metas.description: Paddington is framed for a crime he didn't commit, and his family and friends must clear his name.

metas.name: The Mitchells vs. The Machines
metas.description: A quirky family goes on a road trip and ends up saving the world from a robot apocalypse.

metas.name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
metas.description: A wacky inventor creates a machine that makes it rain food.

metas.name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
metas.description: Flint Lockwood returns to his hometown to stop his food-making machine from creating dangerous foodimals.

metas.name: The Lego Movie
metas.description: An ordinary Lego construction worker is mistaken for the Special and is recruited to stop an evil tyrant.

metas.name: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
metas.description: Emmet and his friends face a new threat from outer space and must save their city.

metas.name: Despicable Me
metas.description: A supervillain plans to steal the moon, but his plans are complicated by three orphaned girls.

metas.name: Despicable Me 2
metas.description: Gru is recruited by the Anti-Villain League to catch a new supervillain.

metas.name: Despicable Me 3
metas.description: Gru meets his long-lost twin brother, Dru, and they team up to fight a new villain.

metas.name: Minions
metas.description: A prequel to Despicable Me, showing the origins of the Minions and their quest to find an evil master.

metas.name: Minions: The Rise of Gru
metas.description: The Minions help a young Gru achieve his dream of becoming a supervillain.

metas.name: The Boss Baby
metas.description: A baby who is secretly a business executive teams up with his older brother to stop a rival company.

metas.name: The Boss Baby: Family Business
metas.description: The Templeton brothers reunite to stop a new threat to babies.

metas.name: Ron's Gone Wrong
metas.description: A socially awkward middle-schooler gets a malfunctioning B*Bot, a walking, talking, digitally connected device that's supposed to be his 'Best Friend out of the Box.'

metas.name: Spirit Untamed
metas.description: A girl befriends a wild mustang and embarks on an adventure to save him and his herd from capture.

metas.name: Encanto
metas.description: A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

metas.name: Luca
metas.description: On the Italian Riviera, an unlikely but strong friendship grows between a human being and a sea monster disguised as a human.

metas.name: Chicken Run
metas.description: Chickens plan their escape from a farm when they learn that they will soon be turned into chicken pies.
